Title: Trevor
Plot: After a tornado rips through a prison camp, one of the inmates disappears from solitary confinement and the prison warden is killed. As Mulder and Scully track him, he appears to have the power to pass through solid matter while changing its composition.
GuestStars: John Diehl, Tuesday Knight, Frank Novak, David Bowe, Catherine Dent, Jeffrey Schoeny, Christopher Dahlberg, Robert Peters, Jerry Giles, Keith Brunsmann, Lamont Johnson, Cary Pfeffer, Terri Merryman, Lee Corbin
